summary: Crete is the biggest island in Greece and the fifth largest in the Mediterranean Sea. It's located south of mainland Greece and has a long history, dating back to the ancient Minoan civilization. The island is known for its mountains, including Mount Ida, and the beautiful Samaria Gorge. Crete has its own unique culture and traditions, and it attracts many visitors who arrive at its international airports in Heraklion and Chania. The ancient Minoan palace of Knossos is also a famous site on the island.
title: Crete
